msbt.message: Well, it's been a good year for , I can tell you that. And if we get to hang out during the Countdown tonight, it'll just keep on getting better.
Will I see you tonight? At the main plaza an hour before midnight?C'mon! Let's send out in style together, !

You know that the big Countdown is tonight, right? At the main plaza?I know it's late, but you'll be having so much fun that it'll seem early.And then when the clock ticks over, it will actually BE early. Ha HA!

Some folks like to jump right as the clock ticks over midnight into a new year. Why do they do it? Is it just superstition? Or is it, like, quantum mechanics? You know, like, you have to leap across space-time into the new yearor something? I don't actually know quantum mechanics. I'm , not a cat!
